tweets.text: @SianieRoo @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @PHE_EoEngland I live at top end of Pepper Street which is officially Keele & have woken to the stink in my house several times over the past year. It’s regularly stinks outside in the garden so I can’t open the windows.

Aware of houses in the following areas that had the fumes in the house for the first time on Fri/Sat: Maybank, Seabridge,Keele. 
This is out of control @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK . @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency is out of her depth big time #stopthestink @Cap_it_off @PHE_EoEngland

@yozzerdotcom @A_S_G Thanks mate, much appreciated, it’s filthy, if you get chance report every time you smell it& make sure your friends and neighbours etc know how to report too @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency

https://t.co/9vKapgSGUn tell people to email and then the email suddenly doesn't work.Something doesn't quite add up.A little like not having the monitoring stations plugged in on one of the worst weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink #notfitforpurpose @StinkStopthe https://t.co/qXVbNru1va

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Close it down Clare.  How can you not? The beast is out of control & @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL can’t tame it. Bring in specialists. You’ve seen a letter from the Consultant Paediatrician stating the landfill is exacerbating respiratory problems in a CHILD! @BorisJohnson step up!

tweets.text: @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe it's probably not going to do much , but maybe a written petition calling for an enquiry in @EnvAgency and total closure of #WalleysQuarry might spur them on . It takes 6 months to run on epetitions , we can't let this linger on that long .

@Markmalkin15 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL They all appear to be talking a lot and achieving nothing. The government can do something about this but they don't seem to want to

tweets.text: 4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.
This habitat is due to be destroyed in nesting season, please ask @EnvAgency @kiergroup Not to do it! #ecologicalcrisis https://t.co/rkakIcKG67

*This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water. I’ve just reported it to @EnvAgency.  Totally unacceptable.  And not an isolated incident. https://t.co/1l45pAbllG

tweets.text:
We continue to support @shropsfire & partners respond to the fire at the former Greenway Polymers waste site #Telford

We're using tankers to remove contaminated fire water to protect local rivers & abstractors and today, sampling the river #Tern to monitor environmental impacts. https://t.co/BhxjGK4f3b

I had a wonderful day out yesterday 25 miles away from the stinking landfill, it made me to realise how anxious I am at home!
Does anyone feel the same, worried, concerned how this is affecting us short and long term where we have lived our lives beforehand free of pollution https://t.co/PhnIHb9Co6

Yes. Day out yesterday the fresh air & feeling of freedom from the physical mental chains of the landfill fumes. If I had the money I’d just buy a second home somewhere else. It’s tragic @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @MPGeorgeEustice #StopTheStink https://t.co/a3BiLcgW4Z

The abundant fish in #RiverLark at #Mildenhall are most diseased &/or damaged I've ever seen. A huge amount of fin rot in the roach. Quite distressing swimming amongst such sick fish.  The river is full of gungy sediment floating down, everything covered in silt & algae. 3/3 https://t.co/CZLH7W8eHE

Shame on you @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA It’s not getting better! Residents of Staffordshire village launch fightback against a landfill https://t.co/cQ4CnRZz7f via @MailOnline #StopTheStink

I’m dreading another night! Even thinking of camping out which I’ve never done in my life! What have we done to deserve this? We’re frightened for our lives @BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgencyMids @BBCNews @itvnews @PHE_uk @humanrights1st https://t.co/KB88Q3d38y

Well it wouldn’t be Bank Holiday without a bit of rain ☔️ flood wardens in Calderdale are on stand by for a deluge between 2-7pm, potential flood alerts ⚠️ I’m foreseeing surface water issues at this stage! #happydays #not @Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE

3.5.21 - no gas in our house overnight, no contractions, kicks back to a normal level and slept through the night. But there’s no link, right?
